There has been no time for the supporters to get bored during an eventful opening 45 minutes. Both teams provided some breathtaking moments. The home side is dominant and dictating the tempo of the game, mainly because of their work rate and accurate passing. The home team makes a lot of passes and attempts to maintain possession. As for the away side, it's obvious that defence has the highest priority for them.
